fields.Notes:
Independence, Louisiana;
Steven is a 3rd generation Sicilian American, he's taught himself a lot of the language by practicing with relatives and Facebook groups. He would like to see more Sicilian Americans using the language, because it's rare to find descendants of Sicilian immigrants that know the language.
fields.Transcription:
"Binidica a tutti,
Pi fari a ficu 'n un annu √® mpurtanti pi scegghiri na rama cu tri
o chiui gemmi daccuss√¨, si vidi. Si tagghia sta rama e ci metti
nterra daccuss√¨ e ci metti l'acqua quannu nicissariu. E doppu
tempu chista avi tri simana e chisti hannu tri misi, di nivura e
janca e chista cca un annu. Videmu, si vidi...si vidi comu beddi
tala....va beni ciau a tutti!"
fields.Translation: Blessings a everyone, To make a fig tree in a year it is important to chose a branch with three or more buds like this, you see. You cut this branch and put it in dirt like this and water it when necessary. And after time this one is three weeks and these are three months, one black fig and one white fig and this is one year old. Let's us, you see....do you see how beautiful look....alright bye everyone!
